# Strategy: BDJ chill FR with Markov + Sector Rotator + JOSFC (Invest Copy)
Source: https://app.composer.trade/symphony/XtLBezle0zwf9y32wP4u/details

**Complexity**: High (9/10)
**Description**: no more 70/30 20/80. just 100% Bull/Stable/Volatile/Bear. removed Stdev stuff + volatility toggle. added VOX checker
**Category**: Tactical

## Trading Universe
This strategy can trade 58 assets:

• **Stocks**: VIXY, QQQ, SPY, TQQQ, UVXY, SPXL, TECL, UPRO, SQQQ, TLT, VTV, PSQ, VOX, XLK, XLF, AGG, SH, SOXX, SOXL, BIL, IEF, XLP, UUP, VDE, SMH, NAIL, TMF, SHV, BSV, BND, FNGA, QLD, TMV, IOO, BTAL, QQQE, VOOG, VOOV, XLE, XLY, FAS, XLV, CURE, ERX, XLB, UYM, XTL, LTL, XLRE, DRN, WANT, XLI, DUSL, XLU, UTSL, UGE, SPXU, QID

## Strategy Settings
• **Rebalancing**: Daily
• **Initial Capital**: USD 100,000
• **Trading Fees**: 0.10% per trade

## Investment Logic

